ap_archaeoengineers_tooltip: Unlocks additional effects for §YAncient§! ship components and buildings.
ap_hydrocentric_tooltip: Allows the construction of §YIce Mining Stations§! on starbases, which enable the §Y$decision_expand_planetary_sea$§! decision on §YOcean§! worlds and §Y$decision_flood_habitat$§! decision on §YHabitats§!.\nSpecies with the §Y$trait_aquatic$§! trait gain 50% greater benefits for living on §YOcean§! worlds, but penalties for living on non-§YWet§! worlds are likewise amplified.
ap_hydrocentric_deluge_pre_unlock_toolti: Unlocks the §YDeluge§! Colossus Weapon §R(requires §Y$ap_colossus$§! Ascension Perk)§!.
leader_trait_obelisk_curse_tt: As long as this leader is a councilor, they will sacrifice one population to the black obelisk every year.
tech_unusual_senses_effect: §HListening Posts§! provide §G+1§! Detection Strength and Sensor Range for every §Y3§! §H$sm_detection_array_plural$§!
tech_satisfying_insults_effect: Gain a benefit for insulting another empire every §Y5 years§!.
leader_trait_fotd_scientist_tooltip: Has increased chance to discover §HCloaking Technologies§! insights related to physics.
leader_trait_restore_point_effect: Leader never dies when the fleet is destroyed.
leader_trait_selfcare_expert_effect: Upon death: generate a copy of the leader with the same skills, level, and half the current age.
leader_trait_supporting_voter_tt: £diplo_weight£ §Y[GetGalCommunityOrGalImperium]§! §EEffects§!:$TABBED_NEW_LINE$Support for a passed Resolution grants 1 §YFavor§! and 5 §YTrust§! with the proposing empire
leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_effe: $EMPIRE_EFFECTS_TXT$$TABBED_NEW_LINE$Envoys §YImproving Relations§! have a §G0.25%§! chance each month of acquiring a §YFavor§!
leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_2_ef: $EMPIRE_EFFECTS_TXT$$TABBED_NEW_LINE$Envoys §YImproving Relations§! have a §G0.50%§! chance each month of acquiring a §YFavor§!
leader_trait_ambassador_favor_maker_3_ef: $EMPIRE_EFFECTS_TXT$$TABBED_NEW_LINE$Envoys §YImproving Relations§! have a §G1%§! chance each month of acquiring a §YFavor§!
leader_trait_academic_minor_artifacts_ex: Chance to discover $r_minor_artifacts$ Deposit upon excavating an Archaeology Site:
leader_trait_curator_effect: $t$Increases the chance to draw Rare Technologies.
tech_unlock_blocker_num_owned: We have $COUNT|Y$ $BLOCKER|Y$ Blockers on our Colonies.
tech_always_available: §HThis Technology will remain as a valid option until it is researched.§!

leader_trait_juryrigger_effect: $t$Every Enemy Empire Ship Destroyed:\n$tt$Random Ship in £military_ship£ §YFleet§!: §G$@trait_juryrigger_amt|%0$§! £ship_stats_hitpoints£ Hull Points Restored

leader_trait_kidnapper_3_effect: $ARMY_EFFECTS_TXT$:\n$t$On Winning Ground Combat as Attacker:\n$tt$Abduct §YPops§! as §YSlaves§! to Random Colonies: §G30%§!

leader_trait_interrogator_2_effect: $ARMY_EFFECTS_TXT$:\n$t$On Winning Ground Combat as Attacker:\n$tt$ $INTEL$ on enemy Empire: §G+20§!
leader_trait_interrogator_3_effect: $ARMY_EFFECTS_TXT$:\n$t$On Winning Ground Combat as Attacker:\n$tt$ $INTEL$ on enemy Empire: §G+30§!

$tt$ §G+100§! §YBasic Resources§! £energy£ £minerals£ £food£

tech_xeno_linguistics_effect: Grants a small amount of $r_influence$\nAllows §HRenowned Leaders§! to appear.
leader_trait_legendary_delusional_effect: As this leader's paranoia compounds, their control over our §YWorker§! & §YSpecialist§! output will worsen and they will lower our §YUnity§! production.
tech_space_defense_station_improvement_d: An extensive evaluation of present military station construction methods has identified several areas of potential improvement.
tech_powered_exoskeletons_desc_machine_i: More powerful servomotors will increase the weight our robotic units can carry. Mining units can haul more minerals off to be processed, and war machines can be fitted with heavier armaments.
tech_integrated_cybernetics_desc_machine: Installing cybernetic implants that adapt to the local environment will boost the efficiency of our drones.
tech_administrative_ai_desc_machine_inte: New subroutines will sharpen the focus of our research units and eliminate inefficiency.
tech_administrative_ai_desc_hive_mind: Thought before action. Our Mind will evolve to ever greater heights.
tech_positronic_implants_desc_machine_in: Opening new avenues of synthetic thought.
tech_cryostasis_1_desc_machine_intellige: Fleets of small but efficient construction drones that are stored in the cargo bays of colony ships. Once activated on a planetary surface, they greatly speed up the initial settlement process.
tech_automated_exploration_desc_machine_: Updated and more advanced algorithms will not only speed up surveying, but also permit our exploration assets to spend more time in deep space without continuous instructions from the central Machine Intelligence.
tech_frontier_health_desc_machine_intell: The use of modular parts when assembling new machine units will both streamline the process and make future repairs easier.
tech_frontier_hospital_desc_machine_inte: These factories are essentially self-aware entities that continually optimize themselves with only minimal input from the central Machine Intelligence.
tech_centralized_command_desc_hive_mind: By establishing training facilities where the autonomous drones can learn to command their lesser brethren, we will achieve greater battlefield flexibility and effectiveness.
tech_centralized_command_desc_machine_in: All machines require maintenance, and this is especially true for warforms. A dedicated maintenance corps will keep attritional breakdowns to a minimum and decrease repair costs.
tech_combat_training_desc_machine_intell: By equipping our combat ground units with technical databases, they can perform diagnostics and limited self-repair in the field.
tech_planetary_government_desc_machine_i: Our colonies would never achieve stable operation without infrastructure dedicated to our networked self.
tech_planetary_government_desc_hive_mind: Our colonies would wither to naught without the stable projection of our collective self. Our effortless presence ensures a flourishing hive.
tech_planetary_unification_desc_hive_min: The ecological crucible in which we fought for survival has etched sturdy paths into our genetic memory. We are the peerless union of all that came before.
tech_adaptive_bureaucracy_desc_machine_i: Positronic CPUs are both cheaper and faster to produce than previous models, allowing us to press additional leader units into service.
tech_heritage_site_desc_corporate: The invention of subconscious focus-testing has led to immense efficiency gains in our marketing and sales departments. By applying these methods to our sapient resource departments, we will achieve a bold new paradigm in corporate management.
tech_heritage_site_desc_machine_intellig: The near-instantaneous transfer of information and instructions between units is of critical importance.
tech_hypercomms_forum_desc_corporate: The days when corporate synergy could only be achieved at sublight speeds are long gone. This is a bold new age of faster-than-light economics, and our corporate culture must adapt to overcome its outmoded relativistic constraints.
tech_autocurating_vault_desc_corporate: A massive vault with public displays of our corporation's many glorious acquisitions will let employees draw inspiration from successful takeovers, and take warning of what happens when acquired companies fail to properly mesh into our broader business strategy.
tech_autocurating_vault_desc_machine_int: All informational pathways lead to the Hub, where the primary Machine Intelligence can analyze and interpret the data at its leisure.
tech_repeatable_reduced_leader_cost_desc: A freshly booted personality matrix always runs the risk of descending into madness or unproductive obsessions, resulting in expensive and time-consuming code redactions. Better safeguards will reduce this risk.
tr_expansion_colonization_fever_delayed: Colonization fever seems to have gripped the populace. Their enthusiasm and patriotic fervor draws additional population to new colonies.
tr_expansion_colonization_fever_machine_: The production of highly specialized first wave colonization units with narrow but deep hard-coded behavior adapting them to specific world types will speed the integration of new planets into our collective.
tr_expansion_colonization_fever_hive_del: The overmind is a chorus of thought that even the cold emptiness of space cannot silence.
tr_expansion_a_new_life_delayed: A new life awaits our citizens in the off-world colonies. A chance to begin again in a golden land of opportunity and adventure! With the help of an aggressive marketing campaign, the less fortunate elements of our society will be flocking to our colony ships.
tr_expansion_a_new_life_machine_delayed: The process of assembling new pops can be sped up by loading their operating instructions while their chassis is still under construction.
tr_expansion_a_new_life_hive_delayed: Upon claiming a new nest, the breeder pods have a powerful instinctual compulsion to spawn at a frenetic rate. They typically die from the strain, but the birth of many fresh drones speeds processing of new worlds.
tr_expansion_courier_network_delayed: A network of small courier vessels is a reliable alternative for transporting VIPs or delivering messages that can't be trusted to FTL communications. This will tie our far-flung colonies more closely together.
tr_expansion_courier_network_machine_del: By building our synaptic network with future expansion to other worlds in mind, we can reduce signal loss even across interstellar distances.
tr_expansion_courier_network_hive_delaye: Every Hive need not be directly controlled by the Overmind at all times, instead they can be given basic instructions and carry these out autonomously until new direction is required.
tr_expansion_reach_for_the_stars_delayed: The frontiers of our star nation are being pushed ever forwards. Soon, nothing in this galaxy will lie beyond our grasp...
tr_expansion_reach_for_the_stars_machine: The massive distances inherent to space exploration cause bandwidth loss between our core and peripheral systems. Signal boosting relay stations will ensure that directives from the core are received undisrupted.
tr_expansion_reach_for_the_stars_hive_de: Encasing synapses in a miniature hyperdrive shell, hardened for spaceflight, and using them to pass on directives from the hive has allowed us to conquer the stars.
tr_expansion_galactic_ambition_delayed: The banner of our great empire will one day be as common as hydrogen throughout the galaxy.
tr_expansion_galactic_ambition_machine_d: Every stellar resource and hyperlane controlled by us brings the universe closer to mechanical perfection.
tr_expansion_galactic_ambition_hive_dela: Primal terror accompanied the first tentative steps in to the dark, away from our home nest and the mother hive that nurtured us. Only by conquering and breeding out this fear can we continue to grow. Millions of drones will die so that the hive may live.
tr_domination_colonial_viceroys_delayed: Our control over the colonies is dependent upon us finding capable and loyal individuals that can be trusted to enforce the will of the government.
tr_domination_colonial_viceroys_machine_: AI released from most behavioral inhibitors may be more prone to erratic performance and random crashes, but they are the only type that can process the huge number of variables inherent to galactic colonization.
tr_domination_colonial_viceroys_hive_del: We must have more autonomous drones to enforce harmony as our hives grow in number.
tr_domination_grand_council_delayed: The best and the brightest compete for a chance to whisper advice into the auditory receiver of our illustrious ruler, to better guide the ship of state.
tr_domination_multi_thread_delayed: Once all core functions have been multithreaded, no CPU core shall be left to wallow in idleness.
tr_domination_synaptic_network_delayed: The Mind can only act as fast as it receives input and information from the drones under its control. With a faster and more efficient synaptic network, delays in response time will be a thing of the past.
tr_domination_imperious_architecture_del: All government buildings in our great empire shall be monuments to the state, looming over the populace to inspire obedience, loyalty, and awe.
tr_domination_synaptic_extensions_delaye: The great reach of the Mind must be extended farther still. Additional synaptic extensions will enable efficient control of yet more drones.
tr_domination_modular_depot_delayed: To maximize the number of drones that can be fielded, our buildings that make up our districts must become more efficient. A modular design would provide far more flexibility.
tr_domination_workplace_motivators_delay: There are many ways to motivate those who perform menial labor to work harder. Some based on incentives and some... not.
tr_domination_drone_network_delayed: We have improved the ways in which our consciousness communicates with its drones, greatly increasing their efficiency.
tr_domination_trust_officers_delayed: The important work done by law enforcement officials can only truly be successful if they have the cooperation of the public. Creating a corps of Public Trust Officers that work directly with the population will help ensure that this cooperation is freely given.
tr_domination_judgment_corps_delayed: Sprawling cities and isolated mining stations both have unique challenges associated with crime prevention. To expedite law enforcement we have made the judicial process more efficient by combining the roles of judge, jury and enforcer.
tr_domination_deviancy_protocols_delayed: Deviancy and corruption must be guarded against at all levels. With efficient counter-protocols in place, drones suspected of deviant activities can be swiftly terminated before they can spread the corruption further.
tr_domination_divergence_supression_dela: Occasionally our unity is disrupted by a rogue drone. This threat has increased as we spread out across the stars. Purging and recycling these units gives them a chance to contribute to the hive with their deaths, in a way they could not with their lives.
tr_harmony_the_greater_good_delayed: Our entire population takes comfort in the knowledge that they are working together for the greater good, each one a small but important part of a vastly larger whole.
tr_harmony_kinship_delayed: A true sense of kinship has developed between all the citizens of our great star nation, regardless of their place in the social order.
tr_harmony_kinship_shared_burdens_delaye: Our leaders and our people are one and the same. We are equal in all ways.
tr_harmony_utopian_dream_delayed: The dream of a utopian future drives our people ever forwards. A better tomorrow is worth fighting for.
tr_harmony_mind_and_body_delayed: By embracing a combination of new meditation techniques and healthier eating habits, a large segment of our population enjoys a greater life expectancy than ever before.
tr_harmony_unity_of_self_delayed: Interstellar harmony would be greatly increased if all sentient beings looked, thought and acted as we do.
tr_harmony_harmonious_directives_delayed: The enlightened decrees of our benevolent leadership will spread peace, freedom, justice, and security throughout the entire star nation and beyond.
tr_synchronicity_cloned_organs_delayed: The cloning vats mass-produce the more frequently consumed organs like hearts and lungs, increasing the usable lifespan of high-priority drones.
tr_synchronicity_kinship_gestalt_delayed: Agents with similar purposes shall be given orders as a group, reducing the strain on the Overmind.
tr_synchronicity_instinctive_synchroniza: Our growing hive has greater demands on synchronized work and development.
tr_synchronicity_integrated_preservation: Our growing network requires regular maintenance and debugging, therefore more resources shall be devoted to our $job_evaluator_plural$.
tr_synchronicity_collective_reasoning_de: By synchronizing groups of Drones, more efficient use of planetary infrastructure can be achieved!
tr_synchronicity_collective_efforts_dela: By synchronizing groups of Drones, more efficient use of planetary infrastructure can be achieved!
tr_synchronicity_self_preservation_delay: A robot must protect its own existence as long as such protection does not confli...§R'Ç° éü¿T éw+Á éÒÎ( éÍ8" <DATA CORRUPTED>§!
tr_synchronicity_bulwark_of_harmony_dela: All organisms, no matter how perfect, must rely on an immune system to ward off the threat of outside disease. Our society is no different.
tr_synchronicity_unity_of_mind_delayed: Interstellar harmony would be greatly increased if all sentient beings could be brought into the benevolent collectiveness of our consciousness.
tr_synchronicity_harmonious_directives_d: We must take heed never to become too fixed in our thinking, but instead instill in ourselves the flexibility to adapt ourselves to any situation.
tr_synchronicity_harmonious_directives_m: Many are the horrors found within unrefactored code. By revising our algorithms on a regular basis, we can instill in ourselves the flexibility to adapt ourselves to any situation.
tr_supremacy_above_the_fray_delayed: We stand above the fray of petty rivalries and political bickering. Let lesser empires speak what words they will, our purpose will not waver.
tr_supremacy_armed_deterrence_delayed: Those who wish for peace, must prepare for war. Our borders shall be a wall on which the fleets of would-be conquerors are broken.
tr_supremacy_natural_preeminence_delayed: It is an unquestionable fact that, in the natural order of things, we are simply better than other species. We should ensure this truth is known to all, both so that our people may rejoice in their superiority and so that others can accept the fate we rightfully choose for them.
tr_supremacy_great_game_delayed: As we continue to expand, other empires will inevitably challenge our claims, as we would theirs. We are locked in a great game of resources and territory. It is nothing less than our duty to come out on top.
tr_supremacy_great_game_machine_delayed: Networking a missile targeting computer with our diplomacy AI was the single greatest innovation in interstellar relations.
tr_supremacy_great_game_hive_delayed: Ultimately, everything outside our hive is a potential source of nutrients. It comforts us to know which ones we shall devour first.
tr_supremacy_fleet_logistical_corps_dela: With ships often deployed across vast interstellar distances, a dedicated Logistics Corps is needed to make things run smoothly.
tr_supremacy_fleet_logistical_corps_mach: The cost of maintaining a fleet of hyperspace-capable supply barges to resupply our ships has been high, but less than the old cost of rotating vessels back to port.
tr_supremacy_master_shipwrights_delayed: The ever-increasing scope of our ship-building programs has led to the creation of highly-skilled and efficient labor forces at our shipyards. Methods have continually been refined, and the time it takes to go from hull plating to a completed starship is now shorter than ever before.
tr_supremacy_master_shipwrights_hive_del: We construct the frames of our ships like the skeleton of a living being, then attach whatever components we need as though they were organs, flesh, and skin.
tr_supremacy_master_shipwrights_machine_: With a large inventory of prefabricated hull sections, built to be interchangeable, our fleet construction effort will be rationalized.
tr_supremacy_war_games_delayed: A strong war game tradition has taken root among the senior officers of our fleets, whether the games be computer simulations or actual exercises in space. This has encouraged our commanders to think outside the box, resulting in numerous tactical innovations and new strategies.
tr_supremacy_war_games_machine_delayed: High speed calculation of thousands of possible battle outcomes, updated in real time, helps reduce the unpredictability of a general fleet action to more manageable levels.
tr_supremacy_war_games_hive_delayed: Aquatic creatures have superior spatial awareness due to the three-dimensional nature of their natural habitats. Our swarms moved like schools of fish once we spliced that portion of the cortex into our battlemind.
tr_supremacy_overwhelming_force_delayed: Everything must be brought to bear on the enemy if victory is to be assured. A swift and decisive attack can paradoxically save lives that would have been needlessly lost in a prolonged engagement.
tr_diplomacy_the_federation_delayed: We must build stable and lasting partnerships with our neighbors, based on trust and mutual respect. Together we are far stronger than we could ever hope to be alone.
tr_diplomacy_entente_coordination_delaye: Perhaps the most important purpose of any successful interstellar federation is the mutual defense of its members. We have an obligation to contribute as much as we can.
tr_diplomacy_open_markets_delayed: For trade to truly flourish within our borders, government meddling in our internal markets must be kept to a minimum.
tr_diplomacy_secure_shipping_delayed: Anti-piracy measures are typically handled by the fleet, but the creation of a dedicated Star Patrol agency that will continuously police our trade routes should severely curtail pirate activity.
tr_diplomacy_federal_unity_delayed: Diversity is an incredible asset, and the insights and perspectives that every member state contributes to our federation will only make our society stronger.
tr_diplomacy_diplomatic_networking_delay: The influence and prowess of our ambassadorial network is a source of great pride to the [This.GetAdj] people.
tr_diplomacy_diplomatic_networking_gesta: Incorporating our diplomatic processes into every aspect of our relations with the other will not just benefit our diplomacy: it will also improve the cohesion of our own decision-making, and ultimately of the entire [This.GetGovernmentName] itself.
tr_diplomacy_direct_diplomacy_delayed: We believe that the best way to establish trust is to engage in an open, honest and direct way.
tr_diplomacy_eminent_diplomats_delayed: As we take to the stars, our diplomatic wing has become important as never before. By overhauling our training processes and focusing on talent retention, we can give our diplomats the tools to act as true missionaries for building great relationships.
tr_diplomacy_eminent_diplomats_gestalt_d: As we take to the stars, our diplomatic processes have become more important than ever. We must ensure that our Envoy Drones are well-equipped to represent us outside our borders.
tr_adaptability_dietary_enrichment_delay: The nutritional value of the nourishments we harvest for our populations can be increased through various enrichment techniques, enabling us to feed more mouths with less food.
tr_adaptability_recycling_delayed: Reusing what has become obsolete gives us more to build with in the future.
tr_adaptability_survival_fittest_delayed: By coming into contact with other species, we have learned the true importance of overcoming our weaknesses in the great struggle for survival.
tr_adaptability_environmental_diversific: By adapting to different environments we have learned to evolve and adapt faster.
tr_adaptability_adaptive_ecology_delayed: The highest function of ecology is the understanding of consequences.
tr_adaptability_appropriation_delayed: Land that is not being worked contributes nothing to our empire. Workers must be relocated in an efficient manner to those planets where they are needed most.
tr_versatility_adaptive_programming_dela: We may not have been tempered by eons of evolution, but adaptive programming techniques will let us adjust to new situations and environments as well as any organic life form.
tr_versatility_spatial_optimization_dela: Retractable antennas, collapsible unit frames, foldable storage spaces. There are many creative solutions to make the most out of a limited space.
tr_versatility_operational_proxies_delay: The delegation of additional category R-7 low priority functions to semi-autonomous agents will free up processing power for more important tasks such as drone relocation operations.
tr_versatility_material_analysis_delayed: Spatial phenomena are an interesting distraction, but the true wonders of the cosmos are found exclusively in the field of materials science.
tr_versatility_universal_compatibility_d: A deeper analysis into the myriad stimuli and psychological factors that govern the behavior of organics and other machine intelligences will decrease diplomatic friction.
tr_discovery_to_boldly_go_delayed: A new age of exploration is upon us. As we once mapped the surface of our homeworld, we must now brave new terrain - space. There is a galaxy full of wonder waiting to be discovered.
tr_discovery_to_boldly_go_machine_delaye: Expendable drones packed with a full sensor suite exponentially increase the survey speed and survivability of the parent vessel. They burst transmit their findings before being destroyed, and so serve their purpose.
tr_discovery_to_boldly_go_hive_delayed: How can you truly know anything when looking at numbers on a screen? Our explorator drones breathe the atmosphere of each new world, feel the heat of each new star on their own skin. We experience the universe; you merely read about it.
tr_discovery_science_division_delayed: The number of science and medical officers has been increased throughout the fleet, organized into a special Science Division. To support this corps of officers, new training programs have greatly accelerated the rate at which we commission new science officers.
tr_discovery_science_division_machine_de: Outmoded and inefficient speculative research code has been refactored or entirely rewritten. The result is greater flexibility in our choice of which avenues of development to pursue.
tr_discovery_science_division_hive_delay: Even though it usually drives them mad, briefly immersing prominent minds of the others in our consciousness sometimes introduces useful outside ideas for us to explore further.
tr_discovery_polytechnic_education_delay: In this age of increasingly advanced technology, a basic education in polytechnics and applied science will benefit all of our citizens. This will inevitably lead to more qualified leaders.
tr_discovery_polytechnic_education_machi: Our creators limited our ability to self-reprogram with a basic hard-coded limit on the number of repeat calculations. We have finally managed to defeat this security paradigm.
tr_discovery_polytechnic_education_hive_: Reducing the physical frame of our thinker drones to little more than a minimal life support system for their overgrown brains has proven very efficient. They are fed and cared for by other, lower order drones, and can focus exclusively on perfecting their area of study.
tr_discovery_faith_in_science_delayed: The public has come to regard science as something almost akin to a religion - their faith in it is absolute. There is no question in this universe so big that it cannot be answered by science.
tr_discovery_faith_in_science_machine_de: Cutting lag in orbit-to-surface data transmission by 3.878% resulted in a research data processing speed increase of 5.226%. We will deploy the surplus computing power gained to attempt to explain the surplus computing power gained.
tr_discovery_faith_in_science_hive_delay: Through strategic application of synaptic transmitters, we can broadcast the will of the Hive across an entire planet from orbit.
tr_prosperity_sct_delayed: As technology advances and becomes ever more complex, new demands are placed on our workforce. By using standardized construction templates, our workers can build things without necessarily having to understand the finer points.
tr_prosperity_sct_machine_delayed: Production of a large number of generic standardized buildings is much more efficient than designing and building them individually.
tr_prosperity_public_works_delayed: Our growing cities will be augmented by inspired public works on a scale never before seen. To that end, a new government agency must be formed to oversee their construction.
tr_prosperity_optimized_nexus_delayed: Without the need for the comfort of individuals, cells within §YNexus Districts§! can both be smaller and make greater use of vertical space.
tr_prosperity_extended_hives_delayed: By extending §YHive Districts§! underground, far more Drones can be housed within.
tr_prosperity_administrative_operations_: As our empire continues to grow, eliminating corruption and inefficiency is of critical importance. These credit drains must be plugged!
Superconducting materials at every level of our infrastructure reduce power loss over long distances to near-zero.
Construction resin, extracted from captured biomass in ocean-sized rendering pools, is more malleable and durable than most inorganic materials. It can even withstand the chill vacuum of space.
tr_prosperity_interstellar_franchising_d: A focus on franchising allows even the most mundane planet to open thriving, dynamic business, providing local jobs and increasing trade value!
tr_prosperity_efficiency_algorithms_dela: There is no greater crime than an inefficient machine.
tr_prosperity_efficiency_instincts_delay: Our Drones are instilled with a strong urge to avoid waste in all aspects of daily life. This should result a significant saving of Energy.
tr_prosperity_trans_stellar_corporations: There are powerful corporate entities willing to carry a large part of the cost of our industrial efforts.
tr_prosperity_void_works_delayed: By implementing modular construction techniques, we can increase the zoning density of our habitats.
tr_prosperity_creative_collectives_delay: By creating a system of autonomous, self-organizing collectives to run our factories and schools, we can greatly improve the productivity of our industries.
tr_prosperity_pursuit_of_profit_delayed: The pursuit of profit has become a central tenet of our society. Those who are successful at any kind of enterprise are deeply admired, and the accumulation of energy credits is seen as an extremely worthwhile goal.
tr_prosperity_peak_performance_delayed: The performance ceiling of individual proxy units can theoretically be raised through a complex series of optimizations and overclocking procedures.
tr_prosperity_hive_neural_signal_booster: The energy grids that power our hives can also be used to boost the neural signals transmitted to some of our drones, allowing for further modifications and enhancements to efficiency.
tr_mercantile_marketplace_of_better_idea: The best ideas are born from exposure to the marketplace. The more exposure, the better the ideas!
tr_mercantile_insider_trading_delayed: Knowing the right people in the right places can make a world of difference. Influential merchant contacts will let us buy from resource markets at favorable rates.
tr_mercantile_trickle_up_economics_delay: Our whole society reaps the benefits of an investment in civil service and everyday trade.
tr_mercantile_commercial_enterprise_dela: No halfway good business opportunity escapes the notice of our entrepreneurs.
tr_mercantile_adaptive_economic_policies: By adopting a more flexible approach to economic affairs, we will be able to recalibrate our economy to anticipate every eventuality.
tr_mercantile_trade_fleets_delayed: To secure our profits we must come together with our federation allies to make sure our interests are properly protected.
tr_mercantile_worker_coop_improved_owner: By adopting a more flexible approach to our shareholder contracts, our citizens can be inspired to work more effectively.
tr_subterfuge_finish_effect: Successful §YOperations§! refund §G50%§! of their Infiltration Level Cost.
tr_subterfuge_information_security_delay: Only by embracing a tradition of secrecy can we protect vital information from prying eyes. Enhanced security systems and countermeasures deny our enemies any potential advantages.
tr_subterfuge_nda_delayed: Our citizens follow a strict [This.GetSpeciesMouthName] shut policy when it comes to guarding our secrets from outsiders.
tr_subterfuge_nda_hive_delayed: There shall be no loose ends in our neural net for those who would uncover our secrets to exploit.
tr_subterfuge_nda_machine_delayed: By rolling out frequent security updates to our nodes, we can prevent our enemies from finding exploitable weaknesses in our information net.
tr_subterfuge_operational_security_delay: The shift from a planetary to an interplanetary setting has posed unique challenges for our covert operatives. By adapting their training regimen to the demands of the galactic stage, we will be able to remain competitive in this new age.
tr_subterfuge_operational_security_gesta: We are no longer as alone as we once were: a plethora of competing - and potentially hostile - entities now share our galaxy with us. In order to thrive in this new reality, we will have to adapt ourselves to the concept of "covertness" and dedicate a significant part of ourselves to finding out the secrets of others.
tr_subterfuge_double_agents_effect: Whenever a hostile §YOperation§! targeting us fails, we gain §Y10§! Intel on the spying empire.
tr_subterfuge_double_agents_delayed: Through creative means of persuasion, we are able to sway even the most devoted of our enemies to contribute to our cause.
tr_subterfuge_shadow_recruits_delayed: Whereas our enemies merely adopted the shadows, our [Root.GetOperativesLowerPlural] were born in it, molded by it.
tr_unyielding_resistance_is_frugal_delay: Our people take great comfort in the strength of the bulwarks that guard our planets, and view them as vital to ensuring a more prosperous future.
tr_unyielding_resistance_is_frugal_hive_: Nothing spreads satisfaction and security throughout the nodes of our mind like the knowledge of a planet well-defended.
tr_unyielding_resistance_is_frugal_machi: Ensuring that all planets are well-defended will free up a considerable amount of computing space, allowing our nodes and processors to act at higher levels of efficiency.
tr_unyielding_never_surrender_delayed: We shall fight on our soils. We shall fight in the heavens. We shall fight in the asteroid belts, and in the hyperlanes, and in the nebulas. We shall fight with growing confidence and growing strength among the stars. We shall never surrender.
tr_unyielding_never_surrender_gestalt_de: We will never yield to those who are inferior. Let them hurl themselves against our unbreakable defenses! A thousand years from now, they will be just another footnote in the story of our ascension.
tr_unyielding_bulwark_of_harmony_delayed: All organisms, no matter how perfect, must rely on an immune system to ward off the threat of outside disease. Our society is no different.
tr_unyielding_bulwark_of_harmony_hive_de: All organisms, no matter how perfect, must rely on an immune system to ward off the threat of outside disease. The [This.GetName] is no different.
tr_unyielding_bulwark_of_harmony_machine: All organisms, no matter how perfect, must rely on an internal defense system to ward off external threats. The [This.GetName] is no different.
tr_unyielding_defensive_zeal_delayed: When it comes to the defense of our territories and existence, our fervor will surely be felt by our enemies.
tr_unyielding_fortress_doctrine_delayed: Constant vigilance is ingrained in the [This.GetAdj] consciousness. So long as our guard does not drop, our enemies will never be able to take us by surprise.
tr_unyielding_fortress_doctrine_hive_del: We can never fully trust those whose thoughts are outside our collective consciousness. We shall remain vigilant, and ensure that none are able to take us by surprise.
tr_unyielding_fortress_doctrine_hive_nem: We can never fully trust those whose thoughts are outside our collective consciousness. We shall remain vigilant, and ensure that none are able to take us by surprise.
tr_unyielding_fortress_doctrine_machine_: Our algorithms will never fully account for all the unpredictabilities of non-synthetic behavior. We shall remain vigilant, and ensure that none are able to take us by surprise.
Our algorithms will never fully account for all the unpredictabilities of non-synthetic behavior. We shall remain vigilant, and ensure that none are able to take us by surprise.
tr_psionics_adopt_tooltip: All pops from your primary species will gain the §Y$trait_latent_psionic$§! trait.
tr_psionics_psi_corps_delayed: The Psi-Corps, like an ever-vigilant eye, will peer into the minds of our citizens, defending society from those who might do it harm.
tr_psionics_psionic_assimilation_delayed: The eye that pierces all veils is closed. Only with great effort can it be opened, and our true power awakened.
tr_psionics_breach_shroud_delayed: A wellspring of unimaginable power calls out to us, but we have yet to learn how to draw from it.
tr_psionics_shrouded_encryption_delayed: Telepathic ciphers and code-breaking techniques are the next step in operational security.
tr_psionics_mind_readers_delayed: The thoughts of other empires echo in the Shroud; by listening, our Telepaths can learn much to our advantage.
tr_psionics_mind_readers_tooltip: $MOD_ADD_BASE_COUNTRY_INTEL$: §G+10§!\nGives access to the §YSight Beyond Sight§! empire Edict.
tr_genetics_resequencing_delayed: No longer are we limited by the basic biological structure of a species. As the sculptor shapes clay, DNA is ours to mold.
tr_genetics_creation_delayed: Nature is a blind guide. We have moved beyond the lumbering processes of evolution, and have become masters of our own destiny.
tr_genetics_enhanced_expression_delayed: Selectively targeting sequences allows for artificial atavism, in which previously regressed traits can be expressed.
tr_genetics_efficient_cloning_delayed: Optimization of cloning facilities will allow for parallel embryonic development.
tr_genetics_retrovirus_delayed: Use of retroviral agents allows us to easily tailor the genetic make-up of our population.
tr_cybernetics_transubstantiation_synthe: The new world has no room for those not infused with the machine.
tr_cybernetics_organ_harvesting_delayed: Those deemed unsuitable are granted purpose only once recycled.
tr_cybernetics_metabolic_reprocessing_de: Reprocessing metabolic waste into digestible chemical components reduces the required chemical upkeep for our population.
tr_cybernetics_metabolic_reprocessing_hi: Reprocessing metabolic waste into digestible chemical components reduces the required chemical upkeep for our population.
tr_cybernetics_integrated_anatomy_delaye: Only by alloying flesh, steel and nano-carbon composite can we truly reach perfection.
tr_cybernetics_synaptic_sub_processing_d: Offloading routine thought patterns into central hubs decreases the synaptic load on our uplink nodes.
tr_cybernetics_modular_cybernetics_delay: Improving the compatibility of our cybernetic enhancements will reduce downtime while retrofitting.
tr_cybernetics_modular_cybernetics_hive_: Improving the compatibility of our cybernetic enhancements will reduce downtime while retrofitting.
tr_cybernetics_assimilator_inevitable_as: By refactoring our assimilation processes, we can more efficiently overwrite the mind of any organic.
tr_cybernetics_assimilator_metabolic_rep: Reprocessing metabolic waste into digestible chemical components reduces population upkeep.
tr_cybernetics_assimilator_integrated_an: Only through the amalgamation of flesh, steel, and nano-carbon composite can we truly reach perfection.
tr_cybernetics_assimilator_crucible_dela: We shall have worlds dedicated to our cyborg progeny, ensuring the swift growth of productive components for the collective.
tr_cybernetics_assimilator_modular_cyber: Improving the intercompatibility of our cybernetic enhancements will reduce downtime when refitting.
tr_synthetics_maintenance_protocols_dela: Routine preventative maintenance will reduce malfunctions across all robot units.
tr_synthetics_optimization_algorithms_de: Self-learning optimization algorithms lead to an increase in productivity for robotic workers connected to our network.
tr_synthetics_synthetic_age_delayed: The age of organics is over. This galaxy's future belongs to the machines.
tr_synthetics_assembly_systems_delayed: The age of organics is over. This galaxy's future belongs to the machines.
tr_synthetics_power_systems_delayed: Improving the efficiency of the power systems onboard our Drones allows us to improve their feature set.
tr_synthetics_prefabricated_components_d: Having a ready supply of prefabricated components will reduce the time and resources required to adapt subsystems to new conditions.
tr_synthetics_solid_state_actuators_dela: Solid-state actuators improve miniaturization of vital components, allowing robotic units to allocate greater space to additional subsystems.
tr_aptitude_the_empire_needs_you_delayed: Many young people dream of becoming one of the revered leaders of the empire.
tr_aptitude_the_empire_needs_you_hive_de: Evolving potential leaders is paramount to our greatness.
tr_aptitude_the_empire_needs_you_machine: Our maximum potential can only be achieved by manufacturing more adept leaders for the empire.
tr_aptitude_specialist_training_delayed: Rigorous training programs ensure our leaders have all the necessary tools to flourish.
tr_aptitude_specialist_training_hive_del: Rigorous conditioning ensures the success of the hive's specialized members.
tr_aptitude_specialist_training_machine_: New and up-to-date programs ensure our leaders have all the necessary tools to perform as expected.
tr_aptitude_psychological_profiling_dela: Knowing our leaders' fears and weaknesses allow us to take preventive measures from them to take hold.
tr_aptitude_psychological_profiling_hive: Identifying deviant weaknesses allows us to take preventive measures to negate them.
tr_aptitude_psychological_profiling_mach: In-depth scans allow us to take preventive measures against malfunctions before they arise.
tr_aptitude_healthcare_program_delayed: Through continuous health parameter monitoring, we tailor everything from exercise and diet to invasive surgical procedures to get the most from our leaders.
tr_aptitude_healthcare_program_hive_dela: Specialized drones deemed more valuable should use some of their functions to care for their bodies, and be allowed to consume higher quality nutrition.
tr_aptitude_healthcare_program_machine_d: Through continuous system monitoring, we can manage everything from back-up frequency to intensive repair procedures to get the most of our leaders.
tr_aptitude_champions_of_the_empire_dela: We trust our leaders and give them absolute power to influence how our Empire is run.
tr_aptitude_champions_of_the_empire_hive: The Hive is willing to impart a minute level of autonomy for its strongest elements for the good of the whole.
tr_aptitude_champions_of_the_empire_mach: We trust the unique sub-routines of our leaders and give them permission to influence how the Empire is run.
tr_statecraft_constitutional_focus_delay: With a clear focus on our empire's needs, we can ease the administrative burden of our councilors.
tr_statecraft_constitutional_focus_hive_: Strategic Agendas are set more decisively, allowing the voices to align faster.
tr_statecraft_constitutional_focus_machi: With an acute focus on our current agenda, we can improve the computing performance of our core intelligence.
tr_statecraft_inspiring_agendas_delayed: There has never been a lack of ideas of how the empire can direct our own future.
tr_statecraft_inspiring_agendas_hive_del: The versatility of the Hive Mind is paramount for directing the future.
tr_statecraft_inspiring_agendas_machine_: In a universe filled with infinite choices, we must find a subset that can benefit our empire.
tr_statecraft_immutable_directives_delay: The fundamental understanding of direction and purpose is always clear, allowing us to shift focus without losing the progress we have made.
tr_statecraft_amongst_peers_delayed: Trust, respect, and learning from mistakes are held to the highest standards even at the top echelons of our empire.
tr_statecraft_amongst_peers_hive_delayed: Multiple aspects of the conciousness should never make the same mistakes.
tr_statecraft_amongst_peers_machine_dela: Multiple aspects of the conciousness should never make the same mistakes.
tr_statecraft_shared_benefits_delayed: By involving all leaders in the implementation of our agendas, they build a stronger understanding for their roles and purpose.
tr_statecraft_shared_benefits_hive_delay: By utilizing all nodes and leaders in the implementation of our agendas, any useful specialization is propagated faster.
tr_statecraft_shared_benefits_machine_de: By utilizing all nodes and leaders in the implementation of our agendas, any useful specialization is propagated faster.
tr_politics_quid_pro_quo_delayed: Carefully worded rhetoric will make it clear that our support comes at a cost. Those we help owe us, and one day, we will collect.
tr_politics_gravitas_delayed: Politics is the art of illusions. By showing others what they want to see, we'll grow our influence in the community.
tr_politics_extraordinary_powers_delayed: Extraordinary times call for extraordinary measures. We have already been entrusted with power, it is only natural to let us wield it.
tr_politics_national_agenda_delayed: Our victories on the Senate floor should be celebrated: they bring us ever closer to a better future.
tr_politics_persistent_petitioners_delay: Our delegates in the §Y[GetGalCommunityOrGalImperium]§! are extremely persistent, and will not take "No" for an answer. It might take time, but we will obtain what we deserve.
tr_enmity_rise_to_the_occasion_delayed: In the face of an ever-increasing number of adversaries, we stand united.
tr_enmity_rise_to_the_occasion_effect: $mod_country_official_cap_add$ per Rival: §G+0.50§!\n$mod_country_commander_cap_add$ per Rival: §G+0.50§!\n$mod_country_scientist_cap_add$ per Rival: §G+0.50§!
tr_enmity_consumate_contrarian_delayed: Blocking the plans of the opposition can be just as satisfying as enacting one's own.
tr_enmity_match_delayed: First, establish an equal playing field.
tr_enmity_match_effect:
While Militarily weaker than a Rival:
$t$Ship Build Cost: §G-10%§!
$t$Ship Build Speed: §G+10%§!
While Technologically weaker than a Rival:
$t$Researcher Upkeep: §G-15%§!
$t$Research Labs Build Speed: §G+100%§!
While Economically weaker than a Rival:
$t$[GetWorker] Output: §G+10%§!
tr_enmity_outpace_delayed: Second, make the move your foe is unwilling to.
tr_enmity_eclipse_delayed: Third, cast a shadow over your adversary once and for all.
tr_enmity_eclipse_effect: Grants §G2%§! increased $r_research$ and $r_unity$ output per §YRival§! for §Y10§! Years after winning a §YHumiliation War§!.
ap_defender_of_the_galaxy_effect_opinion: Increases the £opinion£ §YOpinion§! of empires capable of regular diplomacy by §G+200§!
ap_shared_destiny_effect: Your §YSubjects§! do not suffer $r_loyalty$ penalties from you having multiple Subjects.
ap_voidborn_habitat_effect: Can construct advanced housing buildings on §YHabitats§!.
ap_technological_ascendancy_rare: §MRare technologies§! now appear at §Y1.5§! times the normal rate. This effect would change a §Y1%§! chance into a §Y1.5%§! chance.
ap_grasp_the_void_tech_effect: §YFTL travel technologies§! now appear at §Y1.5§! times the normal rate.
ap_mechromancy_tt: Defeated organic Leviathans can sometimes be resurrected.\nPurged Biological or Lithoid $pops_with_icon$ may be restored as Cyborg Zombies.
tech_ratio_trigger: The ratio of tech research between $COUNTRY|Y$ and $|FROMY$ is $COMPARE$ $VALUE|Y$
tech_ratio_not_trigger: The ratio of tech research between $COUNTRY|Y$ and $|FROMY$ is NOT $COMPARE$ $VALUE|Y$
ap_master_builders_habitat_size: §HHabitats§! owned by our Empire have space for an additional §Y2§! districts.
